## Your code
```{r}
# Given some information
R <- 0.09
M <- 10000
T <- 3
# What I need to do
PDV <- 
{
  M/(1+R)**T
}
PDV
```

# function
## 製作出額外環境來執行
```{r}
getPDV <- function(R,M,T) 
{
  M/(1+R)**T
}
getPDV(R=0.09, T=3, M=10000)
```

```{r}
debug(getPDV) 
getPDV(R=0.09, T=3, M=10000) 
undebug(getPDV)
```
```{r}
# 查詢函數formals arguments要求
formals(getPDV)
# 查詢函數主體
body(getPDV)
# body執行時若有物件不存在execution environment時要去找尋的environment
environment(getPDV)
```
```{r}
# Given some information
T <- 3
# What I need to do
getPDV2 <- function(R,M){
  M/(1+R)**T
}

getPDV2(R=0.12, M=50000)
debug(getPDV2)
getPDV2(R=0.12, M=50000)
undebug(getPDV2)
```

```{r}
  invisible(3+globalX)
}
testfun()
globalX
```
